attributes.action: Allow former British Soldier Isimeli Baleiwai remain in UK
attributes.additional_details: Isimeli Baleiwai or "Bale" is a Fijian who has served for 13 years in the British Army. He has served in Iraq, Afghanistan, Northern Ireland etc. He is married to a British woman and the Government want to deport him. This is plain wrong. This must be stopped. Please sign this petition so this can be stopped.
